abstract: International House Hunting column; furnished four-bedroom canalfront home in Old Fort Bay gated development on island of New Providence in Bahamas is listed for $3,800,000; information about market and tips for buying properties in Bahamas highlighted.
snippet: The luxury housing market in the Bahamas is segmented, with different islands, neighborhoods and developments all fetching various prices....
lead_paragraph: The luxury housing market in the Bahamas is segmented, with different islands, neighborhoods and developments all fetching various prices.
